name: OR_CASE_DX_CODE
description: The OR_CASE_DX_CODE table contains OR management system case diagnosis codes.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the diagnosis information for the case.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis entered.
